abstract: Citadel Investment Group, the hedge fund run by Kenneth C. Griffin, has sold a claim on $423 million of Lehman Brothers’ assets to Credit Suisse Group, according to a filing with the New York Bankruptcy Court.
snippet: Citadel Investment Group, the hedge fund run by Kenneth C. Griffin, has sold a claim on $423 million of Lehman Brothers’ assets to Credit Suisse Group, according to a filing with the New York Bankruptcy Court.
lead_paragraph: Citadel Investment Group, the big hedge fund run by Kenneth C. Griffin, has sold a claim on $423 million of Lehman Brothers‘ assets to Credit Suisse Group, according to a filing with the New York Bankruptcy Court overseeing the bankrupt investment bank.

headline.main: Citadel Transfers Lehman Claims to Credit Suisse
